thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express London - Hammersmith - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of Holiday Inn Express London - Hammersmith, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Phil2408
title: Great location
text: Excellent location, a few minutes walk from Hammersmith tube. Plenty of restaurants close by. Our room was quiet and comfortable. It was modern, some of the plug sockets had USB sockets. Breakfast was very nice. We paid £85, which is good value for London. There is a carpark for an additional £15. Highly recommended.
